comment.author: 80340139@N04
comment._content: I would guess the bottom one on the right side is Tiananmen Square. The gate called Great Ming Gate in the Ming dynasty,  Great Qing Gate in the Qing dynasty, after 1911, it was called Zhong Hua Gate.

comment.author: 51737090@N06
comment._content: left is Cart in Peking; upper right is 大高玄殿 in Peking, from west to east; lower right is 棋盘街 in Peking, now Tian'an Men Square.
